title: The Godfather
synopsis: A classic film portraying the saga of an Italian mafia family in the United States.

title: Matrix
synopsis: A man discovers that the world he knows is actually a simulation created by machines.

title: Interstellar
synopsis: A team of astronauts embarks on an interstellar journey in search of a new home for humanity.

title: Inception
synopsis: A thief specialized in extracting information from people's subconscious is hired to implant an idea in a businessman's mind.

title: City of God
synopsis: The story of two young boys growing up in one of Rio de Janeiro's most violent favelas, one becomes a photographer and the other gets involved in crime.

title: Fight Club
synopsis: A man discontent with his mundane life finds liberation in underground fighting.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
synopsis: A hobbit is tasked with destroying a powerful ring capable of ruling the world.

title: Pulp Fiction
synopsis: A film that tells several interconnected stories of crime, violence, and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
synopsis: The story of a simple man with below-average IQ who gets involved in various important historical events.

title: Saving Private Ryan
synopsis: A group of soldiers is sent on a dangerous mission during World War II to rescue a paratrooper.

title: Schindler's List
synopsis: The true story of a German businessman who saved more than a thousand Jews during the Holocaust.

title: Titanic
synopsis: A love story between a first-class passenger and a young artist aboard the famous ship.

title: The Lion King
synopsis: A lion cub flees home after the death of his father and eventually returns to claim his place as king.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
synopsis: A young farm boy joins a group of rebels to fight against an oppressive galactic empire.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
synopsis: A young FBI agent teams up with a incarcerated psychopath to catch a serial killer.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
synopsis: A young girl discovers a magical and dangerous world while fleeing post-Civil War Spain.

title: Spirited Away
synopsis: A girl is transported to a magical world where humans are turned into animals.

title: Avatar
synopsis: A former Marine is sent to a distant moon and becomes involved in a conflict between humanity and the natives.

title: Rise of the Guardians
synopsis: A group of magical heroes come together to protect the world's children from the forces of evil.

title: The Incredibles
synopsis: A family of superheroes is forced to live a normal life but is called back into action to save the world.

title: Toy Story
synopsis: A group of toys comes to life when their owners are not around and embarks on an adventure to find their lost owner.

title: Wall-E
synopsis: A lonely cleaning robot in the future finds a new purpose when he encounters another robot and sets out on a journey through space.

title: The Lion King
synopsis: A live-action retelling of the classic Disney animation, portraying Simba's journey to reclaim his place as king.

title: Interstellar
synopsis: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: Arrival
synopsis: A linguist is recruited by the military to assist in translating alien communications after extraterrestrial spacecraft land on Earth.
